name: cycletls
description: Spoof TLS/JA3 fingerprint in JS with help from Go
author: Danny-Dasilva

scripts.build:go:freebsd:amd64: cd src &&  cross-env GO111MODULE=on GOOS=freebsd  GOARCH=amd64  go build -o ../dist/index-freebsd  ./ && chmod +x ../dist/index-freebsd
scripts.build:go:linux:amd64: cd src &&   cross-env GO111MODULE=on GOOS=linux    GOARCH=amd64  go build -o ../dist/index          ./ && chmod +x ../dist/index
scripts.build:go:linux:arm: cd src &&    cross-env GO111MODULE=on GOOS=linux    GOARCH=arm    go build -o ../dist/index-arm      ./ && chmod +x ../dist/index-arm
scripts.build:go:linux:arm64: cd src &&    cross-env GO111MODULE=on GOOS=linux    GOARCH=arm64  go build -o ../dist/index-arm64    ./ && chmod +x ../dist/index-arm64
scripts.build:go:mac:amd64: cd src &&   cross-env GO111MODULE=on GOOS=darwin   GOARCH=amd64  go build -o ../dist/index-mac      ./ && chmod +x ../dist/index-mac
scripts.build:go:mac:arm64: cd src &&  cross-env GO111MODULE=on GOOS=darwin   GOARCH=arm64  go build -o ../dist/index-mac-arm64 ./ && chmod +x ../dist/index-mac-arm64
scripts.build:go:windows:amd64: cd src && cross-env GO111MODULE=on GOOS=windows  GOARCH=amd64  go build -o ../dist/index.exe      ./
scripts.prebuild:go: cd src && cross-env GO111MODULE=on go get github.com/Danny-Dasilva/CycleTLS/cycletls
scripts.prepare: npm run build && npm run build:go
